name: Mindful Elopies - Concept Version
description:
Mindful Elopies is a game + a virtual environment currently under development.

The objective of the project is to provide an immersive virtual gamified environment to help develop mindfulness. 

This is a concept version of what we are building. Play, enjoy and let us know what you think.  

Also, don't forget to join our twitter and discord. 

Our twitter - https://twitter.com/mindfulelopies

Discord - https://t.co/aW6USLAkW1

Web - www.mindfulelopies.com
